channel.title: How To Change The Name Of An Item And The Description
channel.description:
Ok I Made A Client ( And The Fire Cape Is Black With Sort Of Like Stars \ Fireball Things Going Down It )
And I Renamed It In "Item.Cfg" From Fire_Cape To Dark_Cape And Changed The Description But Then I Logged In With My Client And It Still Said Fire Cape Any Ideas? =S

item.title: How To Change The Name Of An Item And The Description
item.dc:creator: @I_0ne_H1t_K0 I 0ne H1t K0
item.description:
@I_0ne_H1t_K0 wrote:

Guh Anyone Know How To Item Mask :S?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 17, 2007, 04:49:59 AM[/size][hr]Guh Nobody Knows How To Item Mask >_>

Edit = Oops Sorry For Double Post ;S

Read full topic
item.source: How To Change The Name Of An Item And The Description
